column1: The Purple Pig////We stopped in for dinner here on St. Patrick's Day.  Despite the craziness of the foot traffic there
column2: the service was darn near impeccable.  Unfortunately
column3: I don't remember the exact name of the dishes we had but I know we had the pork shoulder
column5: beets/cheese dish and octopus.  All were very good except the octopus.  It was just ok.
